name: PDFLineStyle
desc: The following constants specify the available line ending styles.

items.name: case square
items.desc: A square line ending filled with the annotation’s interior color, if any.

items.name: case circle
items.desc: A circular line ending filled with the annotation’s interior color, if any.

items.name: case diamond
items.desc: A diamond-shaped line ending filled with the annotation’s interior color, if any.

items.name: case openArrow
items.desc: An open arrowhead line ending, composed from two short lines meeting in an acute angle at the line end.

items.name: case closedArrow
items.desc: A closed arrowhead line ending, consisting of a triangle with the acute vertex at the line end and filled with the annotation’s interior color, if any.
